gobblin.hive.spec

Interface HiveSpec

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HiveSpecWithPostActivities, HiveSpecWithPreActivities, HiveSpecWithPredicates
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleHiveSpec

    @Alpha
public interface HiveSpec
    An specification for Hive registration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<HivePartition> getPartition()
      Get the Hive HivePartition that the Path returned by getPath() should be registered to.
      Path getPath()
      Get the Path to be registered in Hive.
      HiveTable getTable()
      Get the Hive HiveTable that the Path returned by getPath() should be registered to.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        Path getPath()
        Get the Path to be registered in Hive.

      • getTable

        HiveTable getTable()
        Get the Hive HiveTable that the Path returned by getPath() should be registered to.

      • getPartition

        Optional<HivePartition> getPartition()
        Get the Hive HivePartition that the Path returned by getPath() should be registered to.
        Returns:
        Optional.absent() indicates the Path in this HiveSpec should be registered as a Hive table. Otherwise, the Path should be registered as a Hive partition.
